Text:
TY Dibya.

There are a substantial number of A/V drop outs in the first quarter of this version. It plays fine, albeit with noticeable audio drop outs, on Windows Media Player Classic. A Patriot PBO Core (w/ latest P70R2 firmware) though fails at the more substantial drop outs.
I wonder if this was from the original (nuked) source or the repack. I have yet to see a 720p version that is specifically tagged as a repack even though an SD version exists.
there's a problem with the video...
After few minutes video stops. I guess its broken.
Don't work for me either, the video stops at the beginning of the opening theme..
DOESN'T WORK. ends when the opening theme starts, BROKEN VIDEO. I'm just going to dl the standard def since I'm tired of waiting for a 720p.
Works for me. But I cannot scroll through the video.
please fix this, seems to stop just before the credits start
It WORKS but not with every player. I just finished watching the whole episode with VLC, no audio or video problem at all. But with KMPlayer it stops right at the beginning.
